Uses of Class
org.ensor.math.analysis.LinearFunction

  • Packages that use LinearFunction 
    Package Description
    org.ensor.math.analysis
    This package contains code and interfaces representing Real Analysis.

    • Uses of LinearFunction in org.ensor.math.analysis

      Methods in org.ensor.math.analysis that return LinearFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LinearFunction LinearFunction.add(LinearFunction aValue)
      This function returns a new linear function which is the sum of this function and the given function.
      LinearFunction QuadraticFunction.getDerivative()
      This method returns the first derivative of the quadratic function which is a linear function.
      LinearFunction LinearFunction.multiply(double aValue)
      This function returns a new linear function which is the result of multiplying this function by the given number.
      LinearFunction LinearFunction.negate()
      This function returns a new function which is the negation of this one.
      LinearFunction LinearFunction.subtract(LinearFunction aValue)
      This function returns a new linear function which is the result of subtracting the given function from this function.
      Methods in org.ensor.math.analysis with parameters of type LinearFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LinearFunction LinearFunction.add(LinearFunction aValue)
      This function returns a new linear function which is the sum of this function and the given function.
      LinearFunction LinearFunction.subtract(LinearFunction aValue)
      This function returns a new linear function which is the result of subtracting the given function from this function.
      Constructors in org.ensor.math.analysis with parameters of type LinearFunction 
      Constructor and Description
      QuadraticFunction(LinearFunction aLinearFunction)
      This constructor creates a cubic expression evaluator which calculates the value of the expression 'a+bt+ct^2.
